text: Space Facts  Day   Day   Space does not begin at a specific altitude above the Earth  but the K rm n line at   km is a commonly used definition Day     of the Solar System s mass is in our Sun Day   The closest star is around   light years away  it has a planet that is most likely in the habitable zone Day   Jupiter has a massive magnetic field  caused by Metallic Hydrogen near its core Day   Saturn s largest moon  Titan  has a thicker atmosphere than Earth  Titan s atmosphere gives the illusion that it s the biggest moon in the solar system  but in fact that title goes to Ganymede Day   Sputnik   was the first man made satellite to orbit around Earth  Its launched on October     It orbited for   weeks befor it entered the Earth s atmosphere Day   The Andromeda Galaxy is on a collision with our galaxy  Very few to no stars will collide  The giant clouds of gas will form new stars  After Andromeda and our galaxy collide  it will be milkdromeda
